Articles.Content:
As you may know, there is a mod available called the Universe Replacer. It's pretty nifty if you ask me. What's coolest in my opinion is that by using this mod you can customize the textures of planets and moons by editing the appropriate jpg image in the mod. Here's an example. I changed the look of Jool and affectionately gave it the name Mica.

(Orbiting Mica's moon Froth.)

Kinda cool right? Now let's combine this idea with Hyperedit's ability to move around planets and moons.

(Orbiting another one of Mica's moons. This one is Trula. Other moons [left to right] are Mhari, Pakey, and Didi.)

I think this has a lot of possibilities. I wanna see what the community can come up with in terms of custom worlds and names.

Links:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer-v3-2?highlight=universe+replacer

http://www.kerbaltekaerospace.com/?page=downloads

Edited August 16, 2013 by Streetlamp
Universe Replacer and Hyperedit. Links are at the bottom of the original post.
For the probe? Looks like AIES but wanted to be sure.
I Love you street lamp! XD. Nice mod find!!!!
